page.title: 07Arfon Leisure Centre
page.content: The Arfon Leisure Centre was opened in 1984.It is situated on the road leading out of Caernarfon towards Bethel .It has answered a need in the community because it is very popular indeed.There is a 25 metre swimming pool with a small learner pool.In the main hall badminton, 5 a side soccer and netball are played.In the small hall table tennis is played and it is here that the karate and yoga classes meet. There are four squash courts. There is a keep fit room with four changing rooms. There is a cafe with a snack bar.The centre opens at 9.00a.m.and closes at 8.00p.m. during weekdays 6.00 p.m. on Saturdays and Sundays.Schools use the swimming pool during term time.
